paper_abstract: To meet the requirement of multi-channel healthcare applications, a second order incremental I I" pound analog-to-digital converter (ADC) in 0.35 mu m CMOS technology is proposed for minimizing power consumption and achieving high resolution. The ADC achieves 95 dB dynamic range in 240 Hz bandwidth. The total power consumption of the ADC is 80 mu W and the chip core area is 0.21 mm(2).
paper_title: A 95-dB DR second order incremental Sigma Delta ADC for multi-channel healthcare application
